props.cellProps: Props to be applied to the cell.
props.item: Data (key, index and column values) of the displayed item.

events.contextmenu: The event emitted when the user clicks the context menu button.
events.dblclick: The event emitted when the user double clicks the row.
events.[`item.${string}`]: The event emitted when the user clicks the item.

slots.[`header.${string}`]: Slot for custom rendering of a header cell.
slots.[`item.${string}`]: Slot for custom rendering of a row cell.
slots.header.data-table-expand: Slot to replace the default `v-icon` used when expanding header.
slots.header.data-table-select: Slot to replace the default `v-checkbox-btn` in header.
slots.item.data-table-expand: Slot for the expand button in the row.
slots.item.data-table-select: Slot for the select checkbox in the row.
